description:
Pop your bar-mounted headlight onto your helmet and light-up your line of sight. This helmet mount is easy to use, simply feed the strap through your helmet’s vents and pop your light on the central mounting tube.

  • 30mm double-sided Velcro straps weave through your helmets vents
  • Works with Gemini lights and any light with a standard round handlebar mount
name: Gemini Helmet Mount
